item.title: Self Signed Certificate
item.description: To secure your web server you need SSL certificate which can be obtained by two ways Generate a self-signed certificate Obtain from the third party like DigiCert or Thawte Generate Self Signed Certificate Install openssl if not present using the following command $sudo apt-get install openssl Next step is to generate private keys which can be generated as follows, This will ask you to enter a password to protect this key and will generate key file named www.
